Daxamat and the others run off to warn the folk of the city!

Find Jajax at the forum of Bith Gabâr and warn him of the danger
The people of Umbar Baharbêl must be warned about the danger that approaches them from the east!
'TBD - Blah!'
TBD - Blah!
'TBD - Blah!'
Phârex stands at attention, worried by the tidings you have brought to his city.
'TBD - Blah!'
The guardsman urged you to pass through the gate and <rgb=#00FF00>beckon</rgb> for the folk by the pool to heed you.
Daxamat stands by the fountain, a worried expression upon his face.
Will they heed you?
At last some of the folk give you their attention
The folk near the Waterway Market must be warned of the approaching danger!
Daxamat hurries off to warn the folk of the city about the approaching threat.
According to his brother, you will find Jajax at the forum of Bith Gabâr.
A familiar voice calls to you as Daxamat pushes through the crowd
Jajax stands at the forum of Bith Gabâr in the Upper Ward of Umbar Baharbêl.

<rgb=#00FF00>Daxamat's Refuge is just west of the Waterway Market in Umbar Baharbêl, behind an unassuming door.</rgb>\n\nItûr has given you a place to shelter until you can learn what happened to your brother and your friend within Dâr Laja.
Talk to Jajax and go with him to warn the Kindred of the Coins about the approaching danger
You must hurry to the eastern gate of Umbar Baharbêl and warn the guardsmen there of the approaching danger.
Talk to Itûr within the refuge he has offered you
